name: Jekyllproject
body:
### Welcome to Jekyll Project.
Hi,my name is Francis Adu,a Computer Science Student,with concentration in Computer Information Systems at University of Mary Washington.
My hobbies are playing Soccer and Track and Field.I love Football (Soccer in America) and enjoy watching it.Manchester United has been my boyhood club and I enjoy watching them play.Although AC Milian is my native club.
My favorite Football players are Diego Maradona,George Waeh and Franco Baresi.My all time best Football teams are AC Milan 1993-94 and Manchester United 1999  

### School
I am currently attending University of Mary Washing and will be graduating on May 7th ,2016 with an honor as a Bsc Computer Science  

### Skills
My skill range from Programming Languages: Java,C++, Python, Javascript, AngularJS, Postgresql,Some Cassandra, MySQL.I also have professional certification in networking and network (CCNA) security (CCNA Security)


### Experience 
I currently work with G4S as a Security Operation Control Operator
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
